channel.title: Flutter-Desktop on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter-Desktop on Arrans github.io

item.title: KRTirtho/spotube
item.description: 🎧 Open source music client! Available for both desktop & mobile!

item.title: foss42/apidash
item.description: API Dash is a beautiful AI-powered open-source cross-platform (Desktop & Mobile) API Client built using Flutter which can help you easily create & customize your HTTP & GraphQL API requests, visually inspect responses and generate API integration code. A lightweight alternative to postman/insomnia.

item.title: mulaRahul/keyviz
item.description: Keyviz is a free and open-source tool to visualize your keystrokes ⌨️ and 🖱️ mouse actions in real-time.

item.title: leanflutter/window_manager
item.description: The window_manager plugin provides comprehensive window management capabilities for Flutter desktop applications, enabling full control over window size, position, appearance, close behavior, and listening to events.

item.title: leanflutter/awesome-flutter-desktop
item.description: A curated list of awesome things related to Flutter desktop.
